Intimation Under Regulation 30(5) Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements Regulations) 2015
Listing of Equity Shares of Oswal Pumps Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from June 20 2025 the equity shares of Oswal Pumps Ltd (Scrip Code: 544418) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250619- dated June 19 2025.
